metrics.name: alya_batch_total
metrics.help: Counts the total number of batches processed.

metrics.name: alya_batch_duration_seconds
metrics.help: Measures time taken to process batches.

metrics.name: alya_batch_rows_total
metrics.help: Counts the total number of rows processed.

metrics.name: alya_batch_row_duration_seconds
metrics.help: Measures time taken to process each row.
